sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shi xie 濕瀉 , moisture outflow. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：山藥，濕泄，同蒼术丸服 , “ Shan yao : In case of moisture out flow , ingest together with cang zhu pills”. Shi xin feng 失心風 , loss-of-heart wind [4]

Pathological Condition identical with dian feng 癲病 , peak-illness. Za bing zheng zhi zun sheng 雜病證治準繩 Shen zhi men, 神 志門 , Section spirit and mind: 癲病，俗謂之失心風，多因抑鬱不遂，傺無 聊而成。精神恍惚，言語錯亂，喜怒不常，有狂之意，不如狂之甚。狂 者暴病，癲則久病也 , “Peak-illness is commonly called ‘ loss-of-heart wind ’. This is often caused by a depression, when [a person] is hindered in his activities, and his life has no meaning. He is absent-minded, and his language is chaotic. Happiness and anger are irregular. He seems to be mad, but it is not a serious condition of madness. Madness is a sudden, violent disease. Peak-illness is a chronic disease”.
